quest.name: Fashion Face-off
journal:
Marabel looks you up and down, a glint in her eye.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Marabel is seeking an experienced adventurer to aid her entry for this year's Little Ladies' Day walk-off. You agree to help by surveying the Ul'dahn citizens about their impressions of this holiday.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
Having successfully surveyed the citizens, you head toward Eshtaime's Aesthetics to report your findings to Marabel.
Inspired by the citizens' responses, Marabel quickly sets to work on assembling your costume. You decide to wait for her at the designated location per her instructions.

As the fates would have it, you will be strutting atop the stage in this year's Little Ladies' Day walk-off. You make your preparations ere approaching Marabel, who awaits on Emerald Avenue, once more.

You and Marabel manage to take first place in the Little Ladies' Day walk-off and add your names to the annals of fashion fame. She is overjoyed, and you head back to offer her a word of congratulations.

Galvanized by her first fashion victory, Marabel sets forth in pursuit of her next goal: launching a brand of her own. As thanks for lending your support, she offers to help you select an outfit should you wish to participate in Masked Rose's Fashion Check.
objectives: Survey the citizens at the Steps of Nald.
Survey the citizens at the Steps of Thal.
Speak with Marabel on Emerald Avenue.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Yes, you'll do just splendidly... You there! Yes─you, dahling. What say you to becoming a first-place fashion icon?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Ah, forgive me. Where are my manners? The name is Marabel, dahling, and I am one of Eshtaime's Aesthetics' finest accessory artisans...which is how I plan to introduce myself once I complete my apprenticeship.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Now, the crown jewel of this year's Little Ladies' Day festivities is a walk-off: an event in which the visually savvy strut the stage and vie for style supremacy.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: And while I'm no novice when it comes to competitions of this sort, I'm also not much of a winner, dahling. To be perfectly honest, I've never once managed to come out on top─but now that you're here, I'm certain my fortunes are about to change!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: After all, an adventurer such as yourself possesses so much of what I lack: knowledge, daring, and not least of all experience! So, what say you? Care to help this diamond in the rough earn her maiden victory?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Sounds like fun!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: For the right price...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Splendid, dahling! Oh, you won't regret this in the least.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Pah! To think that I would enlist your aid without recompense. You and I will split our winnings right down the middle, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Now then, let's get down to brass tacks, shall we?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Participants compete in pairs of two: one designer and one model. There are no restrictions on who can join─style icons of all shapes and sizes may enter. The only condition is that those who walk the stage don an ensemble inspired by the holiday.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: But as far as themes go, it's a touch broad. Makes it rather difficult to decide on a direction for the costume... Perhaps you can offer some inspiration, though! Tell me, dahling: what's one word that comes to mind when you think of Little Ladies' Day?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: “Gorgeous”!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: “Princess”!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Interesting... I suppose that should come as no surprise, given that the origins of this holiday lie in the tale of gorgeous Princess Edvya's disappearance from the palace.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: And while I appreciate your input, dahling, I'm afraid that's a bit too on the nose. If I am to create a truly prize-worthy ensemble, I'll require more inspiration... Wait─we could survey the citizens!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text:
Yes, yes, that's a fabulous idea, if I do say so myself.
Listen, dahling: you and I will ask around for people's impressions of Little Ladies' Day and then rendezvous at Eshtaime's. Savvy? Ta-ta for now!

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04471
dialogue.text: What comes to mind when I think of Little Ladies' Day? Hm... I suppose this isn't exactly about the day itself, but it makes me think of the peach blossoms that always bloom this time of year.

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04471
dialogue.text: Whenever I see those flowers, I know this season's come around once more. And there's something so soothing about their coloration. I can't help but smile when I lay my eyes on those pretty pink petals!

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04471
dialogue.text: Ul'dah really comes alive this time of year. Why, just look at all the decorations strung up around town! And no one would dare miss the Songbirds' annual show. The entire city turns out to hear them sing!

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04471
dialogue.text: No other festival compares to the Little Ladies' Day celebration─not for me, at least. I don't know if that answers your question, but I hope it helps!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04471
dialogue.text: I've always dreamt of strolling through the streets on Little Ladies' Day wearing the most gorgeous gown I can find─like a proper princess, you know?

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04471
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, I don't have proper princess money, and that sort of dress usually costs a small fortune. No choice but to keep dreaming, I suppose...

dialogue.name: CITIZEND04471
dialogue.text: My memories of Little Ladies' Day are somewhat bittersweet. You see, there was a lass I once fancied. All I wanted was to dote upon her like the royal seneschal would. I would've done anything to catch her eye...

dialogue.name: CITIZEND04471
dialogue.text: And while I did catch her eye, she didn't exactly like what she saw: “No seneschal would be caught dead wearing that revealing subligar!” I guess acting like a royal seneschal isn't good enough unless you look like one, too...

dialogue.name: CITIZENA04471
dialogue.text: Whenever I see those flowers, I know this season's come around once more. And there's something so soothing about their coloration. I can't help but smile when I lay my eyes on those pretty pink petals!

dialogue.name: CITIZENB04471
dialogue.text: Ul'dah really comes alive this time of year. Why, just look at all the decorations strung up around town! And no one would dare miss the Songbirds' annual show. The entire city turns out to hear them sing!

dialogue.name: CITIZENC04471
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, a proper princess dress usually costs a small fortune, and I don't have real princess money. No choice but to keep dreaming, I suppose...

dialogue.name: CITIZEND04471
dialogue.text: I admit my outfit was a bit revealing, but I didn't realize that was such a bad thing... I guess acting like a royal seneschal doesn't mean much unless you look like one, too.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Well, how did you fare, dahling? Glean anything insightful?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: ...I see. That more or less aligns with what I heard as well.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: So many folks had their dreams of fashion grandeur dashed by oppressively expensive pricing. Not a new tale by any stretch, but a troubling one nonetheless.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: In that case, what if we were to put together an ensemble that's as alluring as it is affordable? Surely that would resonate with the audience... Yes, I do believe this will work, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Just allow me to take some visual measurements first... I'll need a few yards of this, a spool of that...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: All right─I'm ready to set to work! You just sit tight while I go assemble the ensemble. Ta-ta for now, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: I'm back, dahling! At last, our costume is complete─not a single stitch out of place.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Now all that's left is to win that walk-off. How are you feeling? Surely an experienced adventurer of your caliber doesn't get nervous in situations such as these.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Should I be nervous?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Wait─who's going to walk?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Pah! Of course not, dahling. Why, you've doubtless traversed the whole realm. This little stage should be child's play for you, no?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: ...Hm? Don't be daft, dahling. You'll be walking.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: ...Oh, gods!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: This whole time I thought we had a mutual understanding that you would be my muse, but that look on your face tells me you hadn't the slightest idea. It seems my excitement got the better of me once again...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: The trouble is, this costume is couture, dahling─tailor-made for your beautiful body. I hate to ask this of you at the last minute, but would you mind modeling my work in the walk-off!?

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: I would be honored!

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: If it won't fit anyone else...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Oh, bless you, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: I simply can't thank you enough─primarily because there's no time. I'll help you slip into your costume backstage, so just meet me at the venue and we'll go from there. Savvy?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: See you at the Steps of Nald─and don't dally! Ta-ta for now, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: There you are, dahling! Your time to shine is finally here. Are you ready to strut your stuff?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Oh! By the way, I prepared two ensembles for you: one inspired by the seneschal, and another inspired by the princess. Either should fit you just fine, but do you have a preference?

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: The seneschal costume.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: The princess costume.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Fabulous! I'll apply a few finishing touches, then. You just get ready to command the stage, dahling!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: I bid you welcome, and thank you all for attending our Little Ladies' Day celebration.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Before we commence with today's walk-off, pray permit me to introduce the members of our esteemed judging panel.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: First, we have the host of the Gold Saucer's Fashion Report, the style-savvy superstar with a discerning eye and a thorny tongue: Masked Rose!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Next, we have the headmistress of the Goldsmiths' Guild, the unrivaled artisan of exceptional accessories: Serendipity!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: And lastly, as the resident master of ceremonies, yours truly shall round out the panel.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: The winners of today's walk-off shall be awarded this resplendent crown. Enticing, no?

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Now, then! Without further ado, let us welcome our first pair of contestants...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: You look positively fabulous, dahling! Oh, Marabel, you've done it again.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: It sounds like we're up next... This is it!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: ...Next, we have our eighth pair of contestants: Forename, modeling an ensemble designed by Marabel.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Are you ready, Forename? If so, then step forth onto the stage!

dialogue.name: MASKEDROSE
dialogue.text: Oho... That's quite the unconventional combination. Color me impressed!

dialogue.name: SERENDIPITY
dialogue.text: Me, too! It's such an inspired take on the theme.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: I would like to thank you all for participating in today's walk-off. Each ensemble was a visual delight, which made this competition a joy to behold but a challenge to score─a fine problem to have, I should say.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Yet after much deliberation, we have settled on our winning pair.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: First prize in this year's Little Ladies' Day walk-off goes to...

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Entry number eight: Marabel and Forename!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Congratulations to you both! Please, step right this way.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: We've witnessed many elegant ensembles today, but Marabel's was not lost among them. The panel was particularly impressed with the materials used: appropriately gorgeous yet surprisingly affordable!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: If you don't mind, Marabel, pray permit me to ask how it feels to emerge victorious today!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Oh, it feels...unreal... I can <sniff> barely believe it!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Look at that: the poor girl is completely overcome with joy! And what about you, Forename? How do you feel?

dialogue.name: Q7
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: I had a feeling we would win.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: Marabel's hard work paid off.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Indeed! Your ensemble was worthy of not only approbation, but the grand prize as well! My sincerest congratulations to you both.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Now, before we bring the contest to a close, I have one more announcement.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: This stage will remain in place for the duration of the Little Ladies' Day celebration.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Those who were unable to participate in today's competition are free to ascend the stage at their leisure and walk to their hearts' content!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Now then, let us conclude by giving one more round of applause to our first-place fashionistas: Marabel and Forename!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: We did it, dahling! We really did it!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Part of me honestly believed my losing streak would never end, but you helped me prove myself wrong...

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: I couldn't have done it without you as my muse. I simply can't thank you enough, dahling!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: And I must thank you for the splendid showing!

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: Congratulations once again, you two. As promised, I now present you with your prize.

dialogue.name: BUTLER
dialogue.text: And with that, I shall take my leave.

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Here I still thought I might be dreaming...but now that I look upon this crown before me, the reality of our victory is finally settling in!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: And while I may still be but an artisan's apprentice, today's success has rekindled my burning desire to someday launch a brand of my own─so remember my name, dahling!

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Oh! And speaking of style, you heard the royal seneschal say that the stage would remain open for the duration of the festival, yes?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: Well, it sounds as though Masked Rose will be holding a special Fashion Check for all those interested. You've already proven yourself a more-than-capable model, so why not try envisioning an ensemble for someone else this time?

dialogue.name: MARABEL
dialogue.text: And don't worry: I'd be more than happy to lend you my expertise should you require any styling assistance!
